post.text: "Es necesario obtener más recursos y tratar esto como el problema de salud pública que es" —Hillary sobre el Zika.

comment.author: Mikenzie
comment.text: *It is necessary to obtain more resources and treat this as the public health problem that it is. Not, "that is. (sic)" Secretary Clinton's social media team didn't see the typo, so there you go.

replies.author: Kathryn
replies.text: so....you are on a digital page.

replies.author: Mikenzie
replies.text: This is a digital page, true. It's still a typo. This obviously wouldn't be a big deal if it were a regular person, but she's running for President. No offense, but if she becomes the head of the executive government (a position where a large portion of the work is delegated to other people), then I'd hope that she'd delegate better people to her social media platform. Millions of eyes are on her and what she posts. They should at the bare minimum be spelled correctly.
